dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but it's from Kazhydromet, they're the official source. They're saying it's due to warm air masses coming all the way from Iran.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet forecasters have issued a weather forecast for Kazakhstan for May 15, 16, and 17. At the beginning of the period, the influx of warm air masses from Iran will maintain hot and mostly dry weather across much of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's supposed to be dry too, at least at first? I mean, that kind of heat without any relief...

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, but then things shift dramatically by the 16th—frontal systems moving into the west and north will bring rain, even hail and thunderstorms.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, on May 16, atmospheric frontal systems will begin to affect the western, northwestern, and northern regions, bringing rain, thunderstorms, and hail.

dialogue_turns.text: Hail? In May? That's pretty intense. But the south just stays brutally hot?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, the south holds onto that extreme heat, like up to 40 degrees in Karaganda and those regions, while up north temps could drop to the high teens.

This will cause temperatures in the northern half of the country to drop to 18"28ÂC during the day, although intense heat of up to 43ÂC will still persist in the south," forecasters said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So we're talking a huge split across the country—scorching down south, stormy and cooler up north.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So we're talking a huge split across the country-scorching down south, stormy and cooler up north.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And don't forget, strong winds everywhere, plus dust storms likely in the southern areas. It's a real mixed bag.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And don't forget, strong winds everywhere, plus dust storms likely in the southern areas. It's a real mixed bag.

dialogue_turns.text: But wait, heavy rain in Mangystau too? That region's usually so arid.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But wait, heavy rain in Mangystau too? That region's usually so arid.

dialogue_turns.text: I guess we'll see if this forecast holds up. Extreme weather events seem more common now.
